channel.title: How to make weapon admin only?
channel.description: I want to make dragon spear (s) admin only and have it be 1 hit kill on anything. How Do I do that?

item.title: How to make weapon admin only?
item.dc:creator: @_ballin *ballin*
item.description:
@_ballin wrote:

to make it 1 hit kill on anything find the id of it then go to item.cfg > open with microsoft office word > search the id > change all the numbers except the first 3 to 10000000[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 21, 2008, 03:47:58 PM[/size][hr]to make it 1 hit kill on anything find the id of it then go to item.cfg > open with microsoft office word > search the id > change all the numbers except the first 3 to 10000000

Read full topic
item.source: How to make weapon admin only?
